settings.text: 100% of the energy and water used in our plant and offices are offset through the BEF’s Renewable Energy and Water Restoration.

settings.title: BIOKLEEN
settings.text: Our everyday cleansing choices affect our health, the health of our families and our planet. Biokleen products are concentrated to conserve waste, energy and water. Concentrated products lower your price per use and save your money, while leaving the smallest carbon footprint on the environment.

settings.heading: What makes you different
settings.subheading: 100% of the energy and water used in our plant and offices are offset through the BEF’s Renewable Energy and Water Restoration.

settings.heading: What makes you different
settings.subheading: Biokleen has been awarded official Formulating Partnership by EPA’s Design for the Environment for Formulatory Work and Environmental Stewardship

settings.heading: What makes you different
settings.subheading: Always and forever committed to no animal testing or ingredients in our products
